name: Paula's Tilapia Fromage
ingredients: 4 tablespoons cold butter, cut into 16 pieces

instructions.en: Sauté the chopped onion in 1 tablespoon butter in a small skillet until soft.
Transfer sautéed onion to a medium bowl and let cool slightly.
Add the shredded cheese, mayonnaise, hot sauce, and all seasonings to the onion; mix well.
Place the tilapia fillets on a foil-lined rimmed sheet pan. Top each piece with two pieces of the cold butter.
Bake at 350°F for about 10 minutes or until almost done.
Divide the cheese mixture evenly among the pieces of fish; spread to cover the tops.
Bake for another 10-15 minutes until the cheese has melted and browned slightly.
Optional: For more browning, put the fish under the broiler for a minute or two, watching closely.

notes: This recipe makes 4 servings. The final broiling step is optional but can add a nice brown color to the cheese topping. Watch closely to prevent burning if using the broiler.
